title: The Shroud of Santa Cruz
post:
Perhaps it’s just me, but I do not recall any other period time with the exception of 1978 (maybe) when the Shroud was infiltrating the public consciousness to such a degree.. These random references to the Shroud seem to be multiplying.
Calling Carl Jung [collective unconscious], Pierre Teilhard de Chardin [noosephere] and Marshal McLuhan [global village]
author: John Klotz
